intro: Hi, I've switched to Green Hub, http://127.0.0.1:43110/me.zeronetwork.bit/?Profile/1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i/1D9PFKqnik1Z4JtDZnYhyQERZAu5ZiXqFX

comment.body:
It does not work for me, I've turned DISTRITUTE FILES on and set SIZE LIMIT to 64mb for both hubs, 128mb for zerome.bit, but images still don't show up automatically.
UPDATE: Oh it works fine, I just need to set a higher limit.
@Mzero: 你认为野生动物族群与人类社会哪个更有秩序，前提是作为人类，站在人类伦理的角度来看。
这也就是为何有follow这个功能的原因，所有人都可以只看自己关心的内容。不过对于Everyone，当然是各色人等混杂才对，这样才是合理的。
@Cxgreat2014: 我之前也是如此，可能是个bug？
